import React from "react"; import "./index.css"; const About = () => { return
Smaria Jewelry

SAMARIA CRAFTS IS HAS BEEN ESTABLISHED IN 20017 AS A STORE IN THE UNITED STATES THAT INTRODUCES THE HOLY LAND GIFTS AND CRAFTS THAT IS MAINLY FOUND OR MAE IN THE HOLY LAND. IT’S MAIN FOCUS AND PRODUCTS IS THE JEWLERY THAT IS MADE WITH ANCIENT ROMAN GLASS. THIS IDEA HAS BEEN INTRODUCED TO THE MARKET AS A UNIQUE IDEA OF JEWELRY THAT IS FOUND IN THE HILLS OF SAMARIA THAT IS A BIBLICAL SITE IN THE HEART OF THE HOLY LAND.

THE ORIGINAL STORE DEALT WITH THIS KIND OF ITEMS IS ALSO IN SAMARIA AS A GIFT SHOP THAT LOCATED NEXT TO HEROD;S THE GREAT’S PALACE. THE ORIGINAL STORE WAS FOUND IN THE REALY 1970S THEN IT EXPANDED TO BE A GIFT SHOP, AND A RESTAURANT WHERE A DIVESE TOURISIM VISITORS COME IT FROM ALL OVER THE WORLD THE FOUNDER OF THE STORE WAS A HISTORY TEACER ‘MR ADEL GHAZA” WHO WAS VERY INTO ANCIET ROMAN ANTIQUES.

THE ROMAN GLASS GAINED IT’S IMPORTANCE SINCE IT GOES BACK TO TE TIME OF HEROD THE GREAT AND JESUS TIME. TEREFORE WE DESINGED THE JEWELRY WITH ROMAN GLASS TO BE EVEN MORE VALIABLE.

} export default About;
